metadata.title: CVE-2023-28882 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Trustwave ModSecurity 3.0.5 through 3.0.8 before 3.0.9 allows a denial ofservice (worker crash and unresponsiveness) because some inputs cause asegfault in the Transaction class for some configurations.

criterions.comment: modsecurity package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
